title: Larry Webster of Hagerty
description:
How do you get your dream job? Larry Webster has the answer. His career will inspire anyone, regardless what profession they want to be in. He is the VP of Content at HAGERTY, and the former editor-in-chief of "Road & Track" and Senior Editor at "Popular Mechanics". He's raced vintage cars, restored a few, and driven just about everything. We talk about the vintage Ferraris, racing old Fords, why Westfalias are too expensive, argue over the Ford GT, drool over Jaguars, and more. 

Go to HelloFresh.com/smokingtire10 and use code smokingtire10 for 10 free meals, including free shipping!

Follow us! 

T: @thesmokingtire @zackklapman

IG: @thesmokingtire @fakezackklapman 

Click here for the most honest car reviews out there: https://www.youtube.com/thesmokingtire 

Want shorter podcasts? Subscribe to our new CLIPS channel! https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCD4WGV-W5zD1MK4yHbNGwmw NEW SHIRTS! https://www.blipshift.com/tst

 

Watch the show:
